org.corfudb.runtime.view

Class RemoteLogView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.view.RemoteLogView

  • public class RemoteLogView
extends Object
    This class manages and caches views of remote logs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RemoteLogView.RemoteData
      This class stores data about remote logs

    • Method Detail

      • addLog

        public boolean addLog(UUID logID,
                      String logRemote)
        Add a stream to the remote view.
        Parameters:
        logID - The ID of the remote stream.
        logRemote - The master string of the remote stream.

      • addLog

        public UUID addLog(String logRemote)
        Add a stream to the remote view, dynamically discovering the logID.
        Parameters:
        logRemote - The master string of the remote.

      • addLog

        public UUID addLog(String logRemote,
                   UUID logSelf)
        Add a stream to the remote view, dynamically discovering the logID, only if it is not a given UUId.
        Parameters:
        logRemote - The master string of the remote.
        logSelf - A UUID to ignore, null if we shouldn't care.

      • checkAllLogs

        public void checkAllLogs()
        Check all remote logs to see if they are still accessible.

      • checkLog

        public boolean checkLog(UUID logID)
        Check if the stream is accessible. If it is not, it is removed from the view.
        Returns:
        True if the stream was accessible, false otherwise.

      • getLog

        public CorfuDBView getLog(UUID logID)
                   throws RemoteException
        Get the view to the remote stream.
        Parameters:
        logID - The ID of the remote stream.
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getLogString

        public String getLogString(UUID logID)
                    throws RemoteException
        Get the configuration string of the remote stream.
        Parameters:
        logID - The ID of the remote stream.
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getAllLogsMappings

        public Map<UUID,String> getAllLogsMappings()
        Get a list of all remote logs in the view and their mappings

      • getAllLogs

        public Set<UUID> getAllLogs()
        Get a list of all remote logs in the view.
        Returns:
        A set containing all the remote logs in the view.
